SASKATCHEWAN ARCHIVES QUESTIONNAIRES

NO. 2

PIONEER EXPERIENCES: A GENERAL QUESTIONNAIRE

A word of explanation to the person answering this questionnaire

It is difficult to prepare a general questionnaire on pioneer life because no individual will be asked to answer it has exactly the same experiences as another.

Some of the questions here will not apply to your experiences; others may prove impossible for you to answer, so don't worry about leaving blank spaces. Use "etc."

The absence of paper is not an indication either to answer or not answer.

This questionnaire is intended for persons who lived in Western Canada before 1922, and may be answered by anyone who has personal experience of the pioneer years whether born in this province or not.

If more than one member of the family can answer the questions, they should write them on separate sheets so as apply for a separate questionnaire.

SASKATCHEWAN ARCHIVES

NO. 2

PIONEER EXPERIENCES: A GENERAL QUESTIONNAIRE

A word of explanation to the reader:

Before filling in this questionnaire, it should be noted that it is designed to cover a wide range of experiences and observations. It is not intended to be exhaustive, but rather to provide a framework for gathering information about pioneer life.

The questions are arranged in a logical sequence, and each question is followed by a brief explanation of what is being asked. The answers should be given in detail, and any additional information should be included.

This questionnaire is intended for persons who have lived in Western Canada before 1914, and may be answered by anyone who has personal experience of the pioneer years whether born in this province or not.

If more than one member of the family can answer the questions, they should write them on separate sheets or apply for a separate questionnaire.

Saskatchewan Archives Questionnaire No. 1 entitled "Pioneer Life: What I Did" was distributed in 1973 and is still being circulated. If you have not already answered it, and would be willing to do so, please put a check mark here ( ).

Saskatchewan Archives questionnaires on other subjects will be prepared at a later date. Some of these are listed below. Please mark the ones you would be willing to answer.
